name: Fernando
cooked:
Hi all,
I wonder which open source platforms and devices are there available for health monitoring. As far as I know, the e-health platform contains interesting information
https://www.cooking-hacks.com/documentation/tutorials/ehealth-biometric-sensor-platform-arduino-raspberry-pi-medical
Also, this review on wearable platforms is worth reading:

Open Home Automation – 26 Jul 16

Review of Open Source Wearable Platforms

Open source wearable platforms have, in a big way, propelled the advancement of hardware and software development in the electronics field. Apart from ...


The only open-source wearable I know is Pulse Sensor (https://pulsesensor.com/).
Which other wearables do you know, please?
Thanks, regards from Brazil.
Fernando
raw:
Hi all,
I wonder which open source platforms and devices are there available for health monitoring. As far as I know, the e-health platform contains interesting information
https://www.cooking-hacks.com/documentation/tutorials/ehealth-biometric-sensor-platform-arduino-raspberry-pi-medical
Also, this review on wearable platforms is worth reading:
https://openhomeautomation.net/open-source-wearable-platforms-review
The only open-source wearable I know is Pulse Sensor (https://pulsesensor.com/). 
Which other wearables do you know, please?
Thanks, regards from Brazil.
Fernando
